mapper.sql: Id, ControllerId, RegionId, EquipName, EquipType, PhysicalEquipType, RouteCode, Mile, ProducerCode, ProtocolId, Channel, ObMileage, ObBeginMile, ObEndMile, ObBeginDesc, ObEndDesc, TechLevel, Ip, Port, SerialPortNumber, BaudRate, Parity, DataBits, StopBits, IsDeleted, InUse, CreateDate, CreateTime
mapper.select:
SELECT a.RouteCode, c.Id, c.EquipName FROM ( T_VD_Equip a INNER JOIN T_RegionInfo b ON a.RegionId = b.Id ) INNER JOIN T_VD_Equip c ON c.Id = a.ControllerId
WHERE SUBSTRING(b.RegionCode,1,#{map.prefixLength}) = SUBSTRING(#{map.regionCode,jdbcType=NCHAR},1,#{map.prefixLength})
mapper.insert: insert into T_VD_Equip (Id, ControllerId, RegionId, EquipName, EquipType, PhysicalEquipType, RouteCode, Mile, ProducerCode, ProtocolId, Channel, ObMileage, ObBeginMile, ObEndMile, ObBeginDesc, ObEndDesc, TechLevel, Ip, Port, SerialPortNumber, BaudRate, Parity, DataBits, StopBits, IsDeleted, InUse, CreateDate, CreateTime, ConcurrencyToken) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{controllerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{regionid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{equipname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{equiptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{physicalequiptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{routecode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{mile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{producercode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{protocolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{obmileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{obbeginmile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{obendmile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{obbegindesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{obenddesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{techlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialportnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baudrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{databits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stopbits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{inuse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{concurrencytoken,jdbcType=BINARY})

mapper.update:
update T_VD_Equip
ControllerId = #{controllerid,jdbcType=CHAR},
RegionId = #{regionid,jdbcType=CHAR},
EquipName = #{equipname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
EquipType = #{equiptype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PhysicalEquipType = #{physicalequiptype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RouteCode = #{routecode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Mile = #{mile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ProducerCode = #{producercode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ProtocolId = #{protocolid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ObMileage = #{obmileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ObBeginMile = #{obbeginmile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ObEndMile = #{obendmile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ObBeginDesc = #{obbegindesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ObEndDesc = #{obenddesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
TechLevel = #{techlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Ip = #{ip,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SerialPortNumber = #{serialportnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BaudRate = #{baudrate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Parity = #{parity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DataBits = #{databits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
StopBits = #{stopbits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
InUse = #{inuse,jdbcType=BIT},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME},
ConcurrencyToken = #{concurrencytoken,jdbcType=BINARY},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
